name: 24HOURS
description:
How It all started...

3:00 AM APRIL 26 2024. A raid was held at Newman health and research, facility. The raiders wished to find cures to viruses, new species, and some of them wanted weapons. But all they found were three sets of AK-SNIPER, M9, and a FLARE-97. And research containers what they found in them were parasites big ones at that. The parasites noticed the  raiders and got to them before they could escape. The parasites took control of there body and the only thing they know how to do kill... The public doesn't know about the parasites yet. You have twenty four hours to get rid of them good luck, Your gonna need it...

What is this?

A game were you take on parasites with your weapons , and try to survive.

This isn't good 

I agree it's not a very fun game yet but soon it will be a full game with a ton of new features. There is also only one developer working on this so updates may be slow.

Credits

The song used in this game is made by Mae's Trex with the song name being The Disappearance. They made this awesome song so go check it out. 

How to play

w,a,s,d to move, space bar to shoot, and move mouse to look around. You can also change weapons with 1,2,3 

=========<UPDATES>=========

This is now my top priority development wise. With work being done on the game every day now. Development updates: Added a menu, added a level, added end of level, added dialog, added countdown. Future development updates: Will add level select, will add more weapons, will add difficulties, and will add more parasites. Art updates: New artist will be helping out with the characters and backgrounds. Might add better animations soon.
